schemas.name: Query.graphql
schemas.content:
# Fun right!?
type Query {
  # My Name
  name: String!
  # My Age
  age: String!
  # My Email
  email: String!
  # The company I work for as of now
  company: String!
  # My Twitter handler
  twitter: String!
  # My GitHub name
  github: String!
  # Am I employed?
  employed: Boolean!
  jobs: [Job]
  repos: [Repo]
  talks: [Talk]
  contributors: [Contributor]
  projects: [Project]
  countries: [String],
  speakerInfo: SpeakerInfo,
  # Have fun
  randomCurseWord: String
}

merged.mergedContent:
# https://github.com/SaraVieira/graphql-portfolio/blob/61e59e007025cfa4c6d09538a6ae4b5aff91da8d/src/server/types/Query.graphql:
# Fun right!?
type Query {
  # My Name
  name: String!
  # My Age
  age: String!
  # My Email
  email: String!
  # The company I work for as of now
  company: String!
  # My Twitter handler
  twitter: String!
  # My GitHub name
  github: String!
  # Am I employed?
  employed: Boolean!
  jobs: [Job]
  repos: [Repo]
  talks: [Talk]
  contributors: [Contributor]
  projects: [Project]
  countries: [String],
  speakerInfo: SpeakerInfo,
  # Have fun
  randomCurseWord: String
}

# https://github.com/SaraVieira/graphql-portfolio/blob/61e59e007025cfa4c6d09538a6ae4b5aff91da8d/src/server/types/Job.graphql:
# Jobs I have had or still have
type Job {
  # Name of the Company
  company: String
  # Title I had there
  title: String!
  # Where this job was located
  location: String
  # Started Date
  started: String
  # End date
  finished: String
}

# https://github.com/SaraVieira/graphql-portfolio/blob/61e59e007025cfa4c6d09538a6ae4b5aff91da8d/src/server/types/Repo.graphql:
# All my github repos
type Repo {
  # Repo Name
  name: String
  # Link to repo
  url: String
  # Repo description
  description: String
  # Language used
  language: String
  # Number of stars
  stars: Int
  # Is it forked?
  fork: Boolean!
  # Owner of the repo
  owner: String
}

# https://github.com/SaraVieira/graphql-portfolio/blob/61e59e007025cfa4c6d09538a6ae4b5aff91da8d/src/server/types/Talk.graphql:
type Talk {
  # Talk name
  name: String
  # The awesome event that hosted this talk
  event: String
  # The Date
  date: String
  # Video link if there is one
  video: String
  # Slides link if there is one
  slides: String
  # Have I already done this talk?
  done: Boolean,
  # Where is this ?
  location: String
}

# https://github.com/SaraVieira/graphql-portfolio/blob/61e59e007025cfa4c6d09538a6ae4b5aff91da8d/src/server/types/Contributor.graphql:
# List of amazing people who helped this project
type Contributor {
  # Name of the Amazing Person that contributed
  name: String
  # Their Github URL
  url: String
}

# https://github.com/SaraVieira/graphql-portfolio/blob/61e59e007025cfa4c6d09538a6ae4b5aff91da8d/src/server/types/Project.graphql:
# Dumb and maybe not so dumb Projects/Packages I have done over the years
type Project {
  # Name
  name: String!
  # Description
  description: String
  # The repo of this
  github: String
  # The website of this if there is one
  website: String
}

# https://github.com/SaraVieira/graphql-portfolio/blob/61e59e007025cfa4c6d09538a6ae4b5aff91da8d/src/server/types/SpeakerInfo.graphql:
# Speaker Info for talks (this part is mostly for me üòù)
type SpeakerInfo {
  # My Name
  name: String
  # My Email
  email: String
  # My Twitter handler
  twitter: String
  # My GitHub name
  github: String
  # Shirt size I want
  shirtSize: String
  # Country flying from
  country: String,
  # My Bio
  bio: String
  # My Photo
  photo: String
  # Talks
  talks: [TalksPrepared]
  # Recored Talks
  videos: [String]
}

# https://github.com/SaraVieira/graphql-portfolio/blob/61e59e007025cfa4c6d09538a6ae4b5aff91da8d/src/server/types/TalkPrepared.graphql:
type TalksPrepared {
    # Talk Name
    name: String,
    # Talk Description
    description: String
}
